GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v5.18.6
GSD.description:
staging: r8188eu: Fix warning of array overflow in ioctl_linux.c

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.6 by commit fcdf84a1ddc26eb0cb6029b3ae1ee779e2a30ae7, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit 2b42bd58b32155a1be4dd78991845dec05aaef9e. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: staging: r8188eu: Fix warning of array overflow in ioctl_linux.c
